headline: Roper Technologies to present at Goldman Sachs Technology Conference
summary: SARASOTA, Fla., Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roper Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROP) announced that it is presenting at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference on Tuesday, September 9, 2025, at 8:50 AM (Pacific Time) at the Palace in San Francisco, CA. A link to the webcast presentation will be available in the “Investors” section of the Company’s website at www.ropertech.com. About Roper Technologies Roper Technologies is a constituent of the Nasdaq 100, S&P 500, and Fortune
